item.title: Array String .. Compiling but not doing what it should be :(
item.dc:creator: @Pezlam Pezlam
item.description:
@Pezlam wrote:

ok im making a quick server chooser basically … and well … its running … :

Server :

but when i type 1 … my code should out.print the server name (im using out.print just to test if my string is working correctly) and well it just says press any key to continue instead of showing me the selected server name.

Server : 1
press any key to continue ...

here is my code … any pointers of why it might not be working … or any code snippets that should be added would be great … infact any help at all would be great cuz im getting rather annoyed … ive been staring at it for about 45 minutes now trying to find what the hell is wrong … probably just simple but yeah … thanks Pez…

import java.util.*; 
import static java.lang.System.out;

class ServerSwitchor1{

	public static void main(String args[]) {

		String servers[] = { "jolt3.mehmeh.com",
		     		     "jolt4.mehmeh.com",
		      		     "jolt5.mehmeh.com" };
                System.out.print("Server: ");
		Scanner input = new Scanner(System.in);
		int intInput = -1;

		if (!input.hasNextInt()) {

		}

		intInput = input.nextInt();

		if ((intInput > (servers.length - 1)) || (intInput < 0))
		{


		String selectedServer = servers[intInput];

		out.print(" + selectedServer + "); 

   		}
	}
}
